title: Cafe Arrecife
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Chilean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe in the beach/surf town of Pichilemu. Owners are both chefs that are welcoming and conscious. Everything is sourced locally. Has a variety of vegan and vegetarian food including pizzas, empanadas, sandwiches, salads, sweets, and natural juices. Outdoor courtyard seating only.
